CustomField.description: Full address to be used in Conga documents
CustomField.formula: Address__c & If(ISBLANK(Address_2__c), NULL, ", " + Address_2__c) & If(ISBLANK(Address_3__c), NULL, ", " + Address_3__c) & ", " & City__c & ", " & TEXT(State__c) & " " & Zip_Code__c
CustomField.label: Full Address
